import React, { useState } from 'react' function NavLeft() { const [account , setAccount] = useState(true) const AddAcoount = ()=>{ setAccount(!account) if(account){ document.querySelector(".account>span:nth-of-type(2)").style.transform = ` rotate(180deg) ` document.querySelector(".menu-open").style.height = `50px` }else{ document.querySelector(".account>span:nth-of-type(2)").style.transform = ` unset ` document.querySelector(".menu-open").style.height = `0px` } } return (
